name: enrollDate
label: Enrollment date
description: Date the patient enrolled in your cohort (PT0)

name: lastActivityDate
label: Last activity date
description: The date of the last recorded patient activity

name: deathDateSource
label: Death date source
description: Source of patient's death date information. Valid codes: 1=Clinic Reported, 2=Death certificate, 3=NDI, 4=NDI+, 5=Provincial Death Index, 6=SSDI, 7=Other (specify), 8=Medical Record Review, 9=Unknown. Can submit numeric or text value.

name: subSiteID
label: Sub-site ID
description: ID indicator for sub-sites within cohorts. Use this field for NA-ACCORD cohorts comprised of multiple sites (such as HOPS and MWCCS).

name: hivNegative
label: HIV status
description: Indicates that the patient is a member of an HIV Negative cohort. Use 'Y' for HIV negative patients, 'S' for sero-converted patients.

name: BirthCountry
label: Birth country
description: Country of patient's birth. May be computed from Province (BirthCountry=Canada) or State (BirthCountry=US) if known.

name: transgendered
label: Transgender status
description: Transgender status. Note: This field would be labeled 'transgender' if we were to establish it today. At the time the NA-ACCORD data repository was established, 'transgendered' was considered an acceptable label. This field will retain the label 'transgendered' for data submissions due to the number of changes required (many of which are down-stream from data collection) to modify a variable label.

name: LastNDIDate
label: Last NDI date
description: Last date patient was submitted to NDI (National Death Index) and successfully matched for death information collection. For US cohorts only.
